message:
Requests to fetch users via the Skilljar API are resulting in a lot of unexpected status codes.

These requests should return 200 status codes when a Skilljar user is found.

Please check the runbook on how to debug: https://joinhandshake.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EPD/pages/865566925/Education+Incident+Runbooks#Skilljar-user-errors-(i.e.-Triggered:-Skilljar#Index-has-a-high-error-rate-in-production)

Please note that we should verify that the error here is not stemming from a mishandling of API requests / responses on our side

Please reach out to Alex if you need help

 @slack-Main_Account-incidents-edu
name: Skilljar - User lookup requests have a high error rate in {{env.name}}
